name: Page Planner
author: Don Kukral

sections.description:
Plugin for WordPress that displays a daily report of the defined E-Section (A & B)

License

sections.installation:
Copy “e-section-reports” folder to your WordPress Plugins Directory.
Activate plugin via WordPress settings.
sections.changelog:
1.1

Added verbiage to show plugin no longer maintained

1.0.5

Fixed another broken hook to edit_flow plugin … needs re-write

1.0.4

Fixed broken hook to edit_flow plugin … needs re-write

1.0.3

Defaulted display to toggled
Made section inches 67% and grey
Fixed view post link
Defaulted to today’s date

1.0.2

Added inch counts

1.0

Initial Version
